title: really high ping in lol
body: i got a weird problem in the game. i can start the game and can play on 80 ping and its good but if i am exiting and returning my ping is like 1000 or higher. sometimes its start with 1000 ping and the weird thing here that in csgo my ping is always good only in lol my ping is a mess.if someone can help it would be great ;).ty

replies.body: If you are tasking in and out of game, the game might be trying to catch up with everything that's happened but is suffering from some packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going wrong for sure!  The results will also offer a series of steps to fix your specific issue.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
